Asimismo abrió una tienda de comestibles en un espacio que acondicionó en su casa, ahí; ella vende productos de primera necesidad como, azúcar, arroz, leche, pan, golosinas, y demás. Por todo lo que está logrando, Ángela, está pensando adquirir una moto nueva, con la que pueda abastecer otras rutas del trasporte público de su localidad. Es el décimo crédito con MFP, y como socia antigua de su banco comunal se siente alagada por los constantes logros que está obteniendo. Con el crédito que solicita, ha pensado surtir su tienda de comestibles, con productos alusivos a la navidad y año nuevo, y si el crédito le alcanza comprará varios sacos de abono.
texts.en:
Ángela, 53, is married to Juan, 49.  They have three children: Bruno, 28, Rafael, 26, and Maribel, 24.  They live together as a family in their own house located in Playa Hermosa-San Ramón (Peruvian central jungle).  

This dedicated woman’s main economic activity is farming.  She farms various citrus crops.  She’s been doing this for over 20 years.  Throughout this time she was able to invest her profits well.  For example, she bought a mototaxi (motorcycle with seats that is used to transport people).  She says that providing urban public transport is the activity she’s now engaged in.

She also opened a grocery store in a space she set up in her house for this.  She sells basic need items like: sugar, rice, milk, bread, snacks, etc.
Because of everything she’s been accomplishing, Ángela is thinking of acquiring a new motorcycle with which to supply other transportation routes in her location.

This is her 10th loan with MFP.  As a longstanding member of her communal bank she feels proud of the accomplishments it’s been attaining.

She will use the requested loan to stock her store with foodstuffs, with products pertaining to Christmas and New Year and, if the loan stretches far enough, she’ll buy several sacks of manure.

loans.use: To buy stock items for her store and also to buy sacks of manure.

loans.name: Digna Mabel

texts.es:
Digna, D. 35 años D. edad, está casada y vive con su esposo y tres hijos, residen en El Triunfo, departamento D. Usulután, ella posee un negocio que es una tienda y chalet ubicado en el mercado municipal D. El Triunfo, trabajando D. lunes a domingos.
Digna depenD. D. este negocio para llevar a su familia alimentación, ropa y medicamentos por eso está solicitando un préstamo para fortalecerlo en mercadería para la disponibilidad D. los clientes,  su idea es comprar frijol, arroz, queso, crema, aceite, huevos, carnes, azúcar, sopas, pan, gaseosas, jugos, estos productos son demandamos en mayor cantidad, por esta razón ella quiere estar preparada para atender la demanda.
Su objetivo es continuar en el negocio para mantener estable los ingresos a su familia y cada día ir mejorando la situación económica D. la familia.
texts.en:
Digna, 35, is married living with her husband and three children in El Triunfo, Usulután department.  She has a grocery store and snack shop in the El Triunfo Municipal Market.  She works Monday through Sunday.

Digna depends on this business to proviD. food, clothing and medicines for her family so is asking for a loan to strengthen her stock of merchandise for her customers.  Her idea is to buy beans, rice, cheese, cream, cooking oil, eggs, meats, sugar, soups, bread, soft drinks, and juices.  These are the products that are in highest demand and she wants to be prepared to meet customer demand.

Her goal is to stay in business and maintain her family’s income steady thereby improving her family’s economic situation daily.

loans.use: To buy cheese, cream, cooking oil, eggs, meats, sugar, soups, bread, soft drinks and juices.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE I”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Vilma; ella tiene 32 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de salón de belleza y también se dedica a estudiar el idioma ingles, la socia atiende desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de salón de belleza. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para el salón de belleza como tintes, líquidos permanentes, tijeras y ruleros.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Vilma, 32, is a member of the “COMUZONE I” communal bank located in Cusco district which belongs to Cusco province, Cusco department.

She is in a common law relationship and has a son.  She alternates her daily chores with a beauty salon and also is studying English.  She is open for business from 9am to 5pm.  She wants to expand and improve the beauty salon and is asking for a loan to buy products for the salon like: dyes, permanent wave liquids, scissors and rollers.

She is happy because of the loan and pledges to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy supplies for the beauty salon like: dyes, permanent wave liquids, scissors and rollers.

loans.name: Las Rosas De Maria Group

texts.es:
LAS ROSAS D. MARIA

Ysabel tiene recién 3 meses siendo presidenta D. la Alcancía Comunal “LAS ROAS D. MARIA” a esta conformada por 7 personas q se conocen por que todo el grupo son vecinos (viven en las misma calle)y le pusieron ese nombre a su Alcancía Comunal por que antes se reunían en la casa D. la señora María ex miembro D. la Alcancía  Comunal 
Y tenia un jardín con rosas por eso le pusieron el nombre “LAS ROSAS D. MARIA”
Ysabel tiene 36 años es madre soltera tiene 2 hijos que son dependientes por eso la señora Ysabel tiene ya 3 año trabaja en lo que es venta D. DVD y tanbien venD. golosinas D. esa manera ayuda a su pareja con los gastos del hogar Ysabel invertirá el préstamo que le brindara Edaprospo-Prosperidad en compro D. peluches para venderlos por la fista naviD.ñas pero su sueño es poner un salón D. belleza o abrir un restaurante y con la ayuda D. Edaprospo-prosperidad lo lograra.
texts.en:
MARIA’S ROSES

Ysabel has only been the President of the “LAS ROSAS D. MARIA” communal bank for three months.  The bank has 7 members who know each other because they are neighbors (they live on the same street).  They named their communal bank that way because they used to meet at María’s house, a former communal bank member, which had a rose garden, thus the name: “LAS ROSAS D. MARIA.” 

Ysabel is 36 years old and a single mother of two dependent children.  Because of this, Ysabel has been selling DVDs and snacks for the last three years.  In this way, she can help her partner meet household expenses.

Ysabel will use the loan she’ll get from Edaprospo-Prosperidad to buy stuffed toys to sell during the Christmas season but her dream is to open a beauty salon or a restaurant and with Edaprospo-Prosperidad she will accomplish it.

loans.use: To buy Christmas stuffed toys to sell.

loans.name: San Martin Mb Group

texts.es: La foto fue tomada el la casa de Benita, una integrante del grupo San Martin MB que está ubicado en el Estado de Veracruz en México. Se ve al grupo de señoras al rededor de los arreglos navideños que vende doña Benita en la foto. Ella se dedica a vender ropa y adornos navideños que inicio hace 6 años. Solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa de invierno. Al momento de solicitar este préstamo se siente satisfecha con su crédito. Tiene 35 años, estudió hasta segundo de secundaria, vive en unión libre y tiene un total de 4 hijos; 2 mujeres y 2 varones. Quiere este crédito para comprar más mercancía de temporada y mejorar sus ingresos. También espera realizar mejoras en su casa, cambiar sus muebles y apoyar los estudios de sus hijos. Eugenia del Carmen G. es la Presidenta del grupo. Tiene 25 años, estudió hasta secundaria y es casada. Ella se dedica a la venta de dulces que inicio hace 4 años. solicita el préstamo para comprar dulces y jugetes para vender. El grupo esta conformado por 9 integrantes y todas aparecen en la foto.
texts.en:
This photo was taken at Benita's house, a member of the group San Martin MB which is located in the state of Veracruz in México. In this photo, a group of women can be seen gathered around the Christmas decorations that Benita sells. Benita began selling clothes and Christmas decorations six years ago. She is applying for this loan to purchase winter clothing. At the time of applying for the loan she felt satisfied with the terms of the loan. 

Benita is 35 years old and studied until the second year of secondary school. She lives in a common-law marriage and has four children: two girls and two boys. She is requesting this loan to purchase more merchandise for the Christmas season and to increase her income. She also hopes to make some renovations on her house, change the furniture and support her children's studies. 

Eugenia del Carmen G. is the president of the group. She is 25 years old, studied until she reached high school and is married. She began selling sweets four years ago and is now requesting a loan to purchase sweets and toys to sell. 

The group is made up of nine members and all of them appear in this photo.

loans.use: Purchase winter clothing

loans.name: Edith Maribel

texts.es:
Edith, resiD. en El Triunfo, departamento D. Usulután donD. vive con su esposo y tres hijos D. 18, 12 y 1 ½ años D. edad, tiene 35 años y se dedica al comercio en una tienda donD. ofrece productos D. la canasta básica, este negocio lo administra desD. hace 10 años, en el mercado municipal D. El Triunfo,  D. lunes a domingo.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. arroz, azúcar, frijol, aceite, bebidas, este préstamo le ayudara a tener a disponibilidad D. los clientes toda esta mercadería que es demandada a diario. 
El propósito D. ella es seguir generando a su familia los ingresos necesarios para solventar las necesidades del hogar, también quiere crecer ampliando su negocio.
texts.en: Edith lives in El Triunfo, in the department of Usulután, where she lives with her husband and three children ages 18, 12, and 11/2 years.  She is 35 years old and has a store that sells basic goods.  She has run this business for 10 years in El Triumfo's municipal market Mondays through Sundays.  She is taking out a loan to buy rice, sugar, beans, oil, and drinks.  This loan will help her make all of this merchandise, that is needed each day, available to her customers.  She plans to continue generating the necesary income for her family to take care of the household bills and she also wants to grow her business.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, beans, oil, and drinks.

loans.name: Fany Monica

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE I”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Fany Monica; ella tiene 23 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de confección de ropa, ella confecciona todo tipo de ropa como pantalones, blusas y vestidos, la socia estudia y trabaja, ella quiere seguir aprendiendo a confeccionar mas tipo de ropa, la socia quiere tener una tienda para que pueda vender la ropa que confecciona. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales para confeccionar.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Comuzone I communal bank, located in Cusco district, which is part of Cusco province in Cusco department.
She is Fany Monica, 23, and single.  She alternates her daily activities with a dressmaking business.  She makes all types of clothes such as pants, blouse and dresses.  The member studies and works and she wants to continue learning dressmaking for many kinds of clothes.  She would like to have a store where she can sell the clothing that she makes.  Fany Monica is requesting a loan to buy material that she can use to sew the clothes.

She is happy with the loan and promises to make all the payments on time.

loans.use: The member is requesting a loan to buy fabric to make clothing

loans.name: Guadalupe Del Carmen

texts.es: Guadalupe Del Carmen tiene 29 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa usada. Inicio hace más de 8 años ya que debido a la falta de empleo que tenia no podía sacar adelante a su familia pues por esto que decide establecer su propio negocio. El motivo de este financiamiento es para la compra de materia prima como perfumes, lápiz labial, cremas, ropa interior  entre otros pues se acerca una buena temporada festiva y quiere aprovecharla.
texts.en:
Guadalupe Del Carmen, 29, sells general merchandise.  She buys used clothing to sell.  She started over 8 years ago because due to the lack of employment opportunities she was unable to support her family and this is why she decided to open her own business.

The reason for the loan request is to buy supplies like: perfumers, lipsticks, creams and underwear, among others, because a good, festive season is approaching and she wants to take advantage of it.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
El Comité Mujeres Emprendedoras  es un excelente  comité conformado el 16 de Noviembre de 2010, integrado por 15  mujeres de J.A. Saldivar. Este grupo se formó  gracias a que la  Sra. Epifania S.  se acercó a la asesora en una reunión de renovación de crédito que la misma tenía en la zona para averiguar acerca del Programa del Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras, la misma quedó muy entusiasmada y muy ansiosa de poder trabajar con este programa y ahora ya se encuentran trabajando muy contentas en el 1° ciclo del Programa de Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras.
Es un grupo muy activo, todas las integrantes demuestran compañerismo y solidaridad, asisten a las reuniones semanales y realizan actividades para recaudar fondos para el bien común del grupo.
Es uno de los mejores grupos que se encuentra trabajando con la Fundación  Paraguaya ya que la mayoría de las integrantes del grupo siguen activas desde el primer préstamo y con eso demuestran solidaridad y compañerismo.
Una de las integrantes es la señora Epifanía quien se dedica  a la venta de verduras desde un pequeño negocio que posee en su casa.
Ella solicita el préstamo para la compra de verduras en gran cantidad como, tomates, cebollas, remolachas, locotes, zanahorias.
texts.en:
The Enterprising Women's Committee is an excellent committee which was founded on November 16th, 2010.  It is made up of 15 women from J.A. Saldivar. This group was established when Mrs Epifania S. approached an advisor at a loan renewal meeting that was taking place in her area to find out about the Enterprising Women's Committee Program.  She was very enthusiastic and very keen to be able to work within this program.  Now she and her fellow group members are working very happily in their first loan cycle within the Enterprising Women's Committee Program.

This is a very active group.  All of its members demonstrate camaraderie and solidarity.  They attend the weekly meetings and carry out business activities to make funds for the common good of the group.  This is one of the best groups working with Fundación Paraguaya since most of its members have been active since the first loan and, for this reason, they demonstrate solidarity and camaraderie.

One of the group's members is Epifanía who sells vegetables from a small business that she has in her home.  She is requesting a loan to buy vegetables in large quantities such as tomatoes, onions, beets, bell peppers and carrots.

loans.use: To buy vegetables in large quantities

loans.name: Betty

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE I”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Betty; ella tiene 34 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de confección de ropa deportiva como casacas, buzos y short, la socia tiene una tienda que atiende desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m y por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa deportiva. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales para confeccionar la ropa deportiva.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Betty belongs to the "COMUZONE I" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Betty is 34 years old, single and has 3 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business making sports clothing such as jackets, track suits and shorts.  She has a store where she serves from 9.00am to 6.00pm.  Through her business, Betty gets her children ahead in life.  She would like to expand her business selling sports clothing.

Betty is requesting this loan to buy materials for making her sports clothing.  She is happy to be receiving a loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy materials for making sports clothing

loans.name: Livio Cesar

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE I”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Livio Cesar; el tiene 31 años de edad y es soltero y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de confección de ropa deportiva, el atiende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, el socio por medio de este pequeño negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa deportiva.El socio solicita el prestamo para comprar una maquina de coser.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Livio Cesar, 31, is a member of the “COMUZONE I” communal bank located in Cusco district which is part of Cusco province, Cusco department.

He is single and has three children.  He alternates his daily chores with a sportswear manufacturing business.  He is open for business from 8am until 7pm.  Through this small business he is able to support his children.  He wants to expand the sportswear sale business and needs a loan to buy a sewing machine.

He is happy because of the loan and pledges to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es: Ana es una mujer muy emprendedora y que ha sabido salir adelante ante circunstancias muy difíciles. Ella tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo, su actividad es una pulpería y venta de cosméticos. Hace más de 7 años que tiene este negocio, sabe que tiene la obligación de sacar adelante a sus hijos que son el futuro de su familia. Ella dio inicio a este negocio por la necesidad de proveer el alimento diario a su hogar, ya que además en su comarca no hay mucha competencia es por eso  que ella se preocupa por proporcionar un buen servicio. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de golosinas, granos básicos, refrescos, jugos, detergentes entres otras cosas necesarias en el hogar.
texts.en:
Ana is a very enterprising woman who has known how to get ahead when faced with very difficult circumstances.  She has two dependent children in her care. 

Ana's business is a grocery store and she also sells cosmetics.  She has had her business for more than 7 years.  She knows that it is her duty to get her children ahead in life as they are the future of her family.  She started this business out of necessity as she needed to provide food for her household.  There isn't a lot of competition in her area but she works hard to provide good customer service.

Ana will use her loan to buy candy, basic grains, soft drinks, juices, detergents and other necessary household products.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Las Emprendedoras De La Q Group

texts.es:
LAS EMPRENDEDORAS D. LA Q

Gloria pertenece ala Alcancía Comunal “LAS EMPRENDEDORAS D. LA Q” este grupo tiene ya 1 año y 4 meses D. formado y Gloria tiene el cargo D. presidenta hace 4 meses su grupo esta conformado por 7 personas q viven en la misma localidad, este grupo decidió ponerle ese nombre a su Alcancía por que todas son emprendedoras y casi todas viven en la zona Q D. ahí el nombre. “LASEMPRENDEDORAS D. LA Q”.
Gloria tiene 53 años D. edad es madre soltera D. 4 hijos que son independientes Gloria trabaja hace 23 años en lo que es venta D. pescado asta el momento con el ingreso D. su negocio a logrado juntar dinero para poder construir su casa su sueño D. la señora Gloria es D. poner un puesto D. venta D. ropa con la ayuda D. Edaprospo-prosperidad esperamos que lo logre
texts.en:
LAS EMPRENDEDORAS D. LA Q

Gloria belongs to the “LAS EMPRENDEDORAS D. LA Q” communal bank.  This group has existed for 1 year and 4 months and Gloria has been president of the group for 4 months.  The seven group members all live in the same town.  They decided to give their group its name because they are all entrepreneurs and nearly all of them live in 'zona Q', hence the name "LAS EMPRENDEDORAS D. LA Q" (The Entrepreneurs of Q).

Gloria is 53 years old.  She is a single mother and has 4 grown-up children.  Gloria has been selling fish for 23 years.  Up to this point, she has managed to save profits from her business and build her own house.  Gloria's dream is to set up her own clothes stall with help from Edaprospo-Prosperidad.  We hope that she will achieve her goal.

loans.use: Christmas expenses

loans.name: Anturios Blancos Group

texts.es: Esta foto fue tomada en la casa D. Reyna una integrante del grupo Anturios Blancos que está en la ciudad D. la Perla en el Estado D. VeraC. en México. Se ve a las 9 integrantes en la foto. Ella se dedica a la compra D. follaje para adornar con F. en las iglesias, negocio que inicio hace 30 años. Solicita el préstamo para la compra D. más material ya que sus ventas incrementaron y sus ganacias aumentaron. Al momento D. solicitar este prestamo se siente satisfecha. Tiene 43 años, estudio hasta 2do. D. primaria, es madre y tiene en total 7 hijos; 3 mujeres y 4 varones, quiere este crédito para comprar más  follaje, también espera seguir contando con este crédito ya que han sobresalido sus ventas. Valentina es la presidenta del grupo. Tiene 28 años, estudio hasta 3ro. D. primaria es soltera y no tiene hijos. Ella se dedica a la compra D. follaje para adorno D. las iglesias, lo cual inició hace 8 años. Solicita el prestamo para comprar más ya que lo revenD. en la ciudad D. México.El grupo está conformado por 9 integrantes y es la segunda vez que solicitan un crédito a Credicomún, teniendo buen historial crediticio.
texts.en:
This picture was taken at the home of Reyna, a member of the Anturios Blancos group, in the city of Perla. Perla is in the state of VeraC. in Mexico. The 9 members appear in the picture. 

Reyna works buying foliage to decorate churches alongsiD. flowers. She has been in this business for 30 years. She is applying for this loan to purchase more material because her sales and profits have increased. As she applies for this loan she feels satisfied. She is 43 years old. She was in school up to 2nd graD.. She is a mother with a total of 7 children: 3 girls and 4 boys. She wants this loan to buy more foliage. She also hopes to continue counting on this loan since her sales have increased so much.  

Valentina is the president of the group. She is 28 years old. She was in school up to 3rd graD.. She is single and doesn’t have children. She works purchasing foliage to decorate churches, as she has been doing for the past 8 years. She is applying for this loan to buy more material, which she then resells in Mexico City. 

The group is maD. up of 9 members. This is the second time they have applied for a loan from Credicomún, being that they have a good credit history.

loans.use: For the purchase of more foliage

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE I”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Margarita; ella tiene 49 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artefactos, la socia vende en forma ambulatoria y también por pedido, la socia quiere tener una tienda de artefactos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar artefactos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Margarita belongs to the "COMUZONE I" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Margarita is 49 years old, single and has 5 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling appliances.  She sells her products as an itinerant street vendor and she also sells to order.  She would like to own an appliance store.

Margarita is requesting this loan so that she can buy appliances.  She is happy to be receiving this loan and she pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy appliances

loans.name: Familias Productivas Group

texts.es:
FAMILIA PRODUCTIVAS

Deyanira tiene 3 meses siendo presidenta de la Alcancía comunal”FAMILIAS PRODUCTIVAS” este grupo se conforma por 7 personas que se conocieron por medio de otras Alcancías Comunales y le pusieron el nombre de Familias Productivas a su alcancía por que   lleva el nombre de su institución ,
Deyanira tiene 51 años es madre casada tiene 2 hijos menores de edad Deyanira tiene 1 años trabajando en un salón de belleza su nombre es (YUDIT) haciendo maquillajes peinados y con el ingreso de su trabajo ayuda en los gastos de su casa y  piensa invertir el dinero del préstamo en compras de de materiales y herramientas de repostería sueños es tener un negocio de repostería y con la ayuda de Edaprospo-prosperidad lo lograra
texts.en:
Deyanira has been president of the ”FAMILIAS PRODUCTIVAS” communal bank for 3 months.  This group has 7 members who knew each other through other communal banks.  They gave their group the name "FAMILIAS PRODUCTIVAS" (Productive Families) because it is the name of their institution.

Deyanira is 51 years old.  She is married and has two dependent children.  Deyanira has been working in a beauty salon called YUDIT for one year.  She does make up and hairdos and uses the income from her work to help with her household expenses.  She plans to use her loan money to buy material and tools for making confectionery.  Her dream is to have a confectionery business and, with Edaprospo-Prosperidad's help, she will achieve her goal.

loans.use: To buy tools and material for making confectionery

loans.name: Nemesio De Jesus

texts.es:
Nemesio es un padre de familia muy esforzado, dedicado al trabajo ya que como objetivo ha sido la construcción de su casa. 
Labora como conductor en donde lleva muchos años conservando su trabajo. A pesar de los inconvenientes ya casi, su casa la termina toda de concreto atreves de los 6 ciclos en Afodenic,siendo usasdos todos en infraestructura lo que está muy agradecido por tener el respaldo financieros y que ha tenido un buen comportamiento de pago. 
En donde comprara materiales para culminar la altura de su casa, así como poner el techo, puertas, ventana, logrando seguir en las mejoras mediante el financiamiento.
texts.en:
Nemesio is a very devoted father who is dedicated to his work because he has a goal: to build his house.

He works as a driver and has kept this job for many years.  Despite inconveniences his house is almost completely built with concrete.  He has used six cycles with Afodenic to invest in its infrastructure.  He is very grateful to have had financial support and he has had a good repayment history.

He will buy building materials and supplies to complete the house in a proper manner; he will install a roof, doors and windows managing to do this thanks to the loan.

loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies to completely enclose his house, which is his dream.

loans.name: San Blás Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres de nombre San Blás, se conformó en fecha 23 de abril del 2009, gracias a que la actual Directora General la Sra. Tomasa O., quien se dedica a la  Confección de prendas de vestir, quien ya había participado del programa en otro grupo anteriormente, decidió conformar su grupo y contacto con la asesora para la conformación del grupo,  actualmente esta conformada por 16 mujeres que se encuentran trabajando ya en el 3er. Ciclo, en forma conjunta y solidaria dentro del programa.
Es un excelente grupo gracias al  trabajo solidario realizado y continúan trabajando con el programa hasta estos días.
Todas ellas realizan actividades para recaudar fondos, se ayudan mutuamente para llegar a los objetivos en común que todas tienen dentro del grupo y con la  Fundación Paraguaya. 
Participan activamente en las reuniones semanales y tienen un trabajo solidario impecable. 
Una de las integrantes es señora  Tomasa quien se dedica a la confección de ropas de acuerdo  a los pedidos que recibe ella de sus clientes.
Ella confecciona vestidos de noche, trajes para damas, trajes para novias y otros. 
Sus clientes están muy conformes con el servicio que ella brinda y actualmente, solicita el préstamo para la compra de telas que quiere ofrecer a sus clientas que frecuentar su local.
texts.en:
The San Blás Women's Committee was founded on April 23rd, 2009 as the group's current general manager Tomasa O., who is a dressmaker, had already participated within the program as part of another group.  She decided to form her own group and contacted her advisor at Fundación Paraguaya so that she could officially form the group.  The group currently has 16 female members who are on their 3rd loan cycle, working together supportively, within the program.

This is an excellent group.  They have worked well together and they continue working with the program to the present day.  They all pursue their own business activities to make funds and they help each other to achieve their common goals within the group and with Fundación Paraguaya.  They take an active part in the weekly meetings and they work impeccably together.

One of the group's members is Tomasa who is a dressmaker.  She makes clothes to fill the orders that she receives from her customers.  Tomasa makes evening dresses, ladies' outfits, bridal gowns and other items.  Her customers are very satisfied with the service that she provides and she is requesting this loan to buy fabric to offer to the customers who come to her premises.

loans.use: To buy fabric

loans.name: Las Malenitas Group

texts.es: L. foto fue tomada en el negocio D. L. señora María Elena M., una integrante del grupo D. Las Malenitas, que está ubicado en el estado D. VeraC. en México. Se ve a las integrantes y L. tienda D. abarrotes D. L. señora María Elena M. en L. foto. ElL. se dedica a L. venta D. abarrotes que inicio hace 10 años. Solicita el préstamo para invertir en mercancía y compra D. carnes frías. Sus ganancias aumentaron gracias al crédito que le otorgamos. Al momento D. solicitar este préstamo se siente muy contenta. Tiene 45 años estudió hasta L. secundaria, es madre y tiene en total 3 hijos; 2 mujeres y 1 hombre. Quiere este crédito para surtir en L. venta D. abarrotes y compra D. carnes frías. También espera seguir contando con el apoyo D. KIVA y CrediComún, para ir mejorando sus ganancias. El grupo está conformado por 12 integrantes.
texts.en:
The photo was taken in Mrs. María Elena M.’s business.  She’s a member of the Las Malenitas group which is located in the state of VeraC. in México.  One can see the members and Mrs. María Elena M.’s grocery store in the photo.  She has sold groceries for the last 10 years.  She is asking for the loan to invest in merchandise and to buy cold cuts. Her profits increased thanks to the loan we granted her.

At the moment of requesting this loan she feels very happy.  She is 45 years old and went up to secondary school.  She’s a mother of three children: two girls and one boy.

She wants this loan to stock up on groceries and to buy cold cuts.

She expects to continue to have KIVA and CrediComún support to continue improving her profits.  The group has 12 members.

loans.use: To buy merchandise and invest in cold cuts.

loans.name: Segundo Orestes

texts.es:
Segundo de 33 años, trabajaba en una empresa pero por su discapacidad lo liquidaron y tuvo que conseguir otro medio de ingresos para poder mantenerse él a sus dos hijos y su esposa (su esposa le ayuda en el negocio, sale con Segundo en la foto).

Viviendo en una zona urbana llamada suburbio el comenzó a trabajar como vendedor de lotería pero necesitaba más ingresos por eso decidió iniciar la venta de “corviches” ( hecho con platanos, pescado, cebollas muy típico en ecuador). En la actualidad trabaja desde la mañana rayando los platanos hasta que su esposa los cocina y él en las tarde sale a recorrer las calles en su bicicleta desde las 16h00 hasta las 19h00pm todos los días

El tiene muchas aspiración con su ventas de corviches por eso quiere continuar en el negocio comprando con el préstamo una maquina industrial para rallar los platanos. En el futuro desearía quiere que su negocio se agrande y con la ayuda de la maquina industrial espera vender “bollos” (hecha con platanos, pescado muy parecido a los corviches pero con su contextura mas suave y grande).
texts.en:
Segundo is 33 years old.  He used to work for a company but he was paid off because of his disability and he had to find another way of making money to support himself, his two children and his wife (his wife helps him in the business and appears with Segundo in the photo).

Segundo lives in an urban area called Suburbio.  He started to work selling lottery cards but he needed more income so he decided to start selling 'corviches' (traditional Ecuadoran deep-fried stuffed pastries made with bananas, fish and onion).  He currently works in the morning shredding the bananas which his wife then cooks and then, in the afternoon, Segundo goes out on his bicycle from 4.00pm to 7.00pm to sell them.

Segundo has many aspirations for his 'corviche' business.  He would like to keep going with his business and use his loan to buy an industrial machine for shredding bananas.  In the future, he would like to expand his business and, with the help of his industrial machine, he hopes to also start selling 'bollos' (a product made with bananas and fish that is very similar to 'corviche' but bigger and with a softer texture).

loans.use: To buy an industrial machine

loans.name: San Blas Group

texts.es:
SanBlas se denomina el excelente grupo D. mujeres conformado en  Capiata en fecha 18 D. noviembre D. 2009, gracias a que la actual Directora General la Sra.  Antoliana F. quien se dedica a la venta D. mercaderías, contactó con la asesora en una reunión semanal que la misma tenía en la zona, para enterarse D. la forma D. trabajo que tiene el Comité D. Mujeres Emprendedoras, una vez asesorada acerca del Programa logró juntar a 13 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto ya en el 1° cicL., en forma conjunta y solidaria dentro sel programa.
Todas trabajan con muchas ganas y una D. ellas es la señora Adelaida, una mujer muy trabajadora y que lucha diariamente por el bien D. su familia. 
Ella se dedica a la venta D. aceite D. comer, cuenta con mercaderías D. varios tipos y variedad. 
Ella solicita el préstamo para la compra D. aceite en gran cantidad.
texts.en:
SanBlas is the name of this excellent group of women which was founded in Capiata on November 18th, 2009.  The current general manager Antoliana F., who sells merchandise, contacted a Fundación Paraguaya advisor during a weekly meeting that she was giving in her area, to find out about how the Enterprising Women's Committee program worked.  Once she had been advised about the program, she managed to gather together 13 women who are now working very happily on their first loan cycle, in a united and supportive way, within the program.

All of the women work enthusiastically and one of them is Adelaida.  Adelaida is a very hard-working woman who works hard every day for the well-being of her family.  She mainly sells cooking oil but has various types and varieties of merchandise.  She is requesting a loan to buy oil in large quantities.

loans.use: To buy cooking oil in large quantities

loans.name: Walter

texts.es:
El señor es soltero, vive en el barrio San José de la ciudad de Pilar.
Vive en casa de sus padres, posee su taller propio de motocicletas en el mismo lugar, donde atiende a sus clientelas, brindando sus servicios profesionales.
Solicita el crédito para compras de repuestos que utiliza en  su negocio.
Cuenta con una antigüedad en el ramo más de 2 años, brindando sus buenos servicios a sus clientelas.
Cliente manifiesta que con la ayuda del crédito de la Fundación Paraguaya se ha fortalecido  más su microempresa y  agradece por los buenos servicios que les brindamos.
texts.en:
Walter is single.  He lives in the San José neighborhood of the city of Pilar in his parents' home.  He owns his own motorcycle repair shop in the same neighborhood where he serves his customers, providing his professional services.

He is requesting this loan to buy the spare parts that he uses in his business.  He has been in the business for more than 2 years, providing a good service to his customers.  He tells us that, with the help of a loan from Fundación Paraguaya, he has further strengthened his small business and he is grateful to the institution for the good services with which we provide him.

loans.use: To buy motorcycle spare parts

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es:
Humberto de 35 años, es un hombre trabajador que hace 15 años atrás comenzó como vendedor ambulante de cocos en las calles del suburbio. 

Viviendo con su esposa y su hijo de 7 años en una zona urbana ha estado trabajando en un negocio fijo que en la actualidad decidió ubicar en el mercado del suburbio donde transitan muchas personas en busca de vivieres. Vende jugos naturales de sandia, naranja, limón etc. Comienza su día instalando una carpa en el mercado desde las 07h00am hasta que terM. su jornada de trabajo a las 14h00pm. Su esposa  también le ayuda en las mañana haciendo unas tostadas para vender en su negocio. Una de las complicaciones que tiene para vender sus jugos es que el puesto de mercado queda afuera y esta a la interperie de los ladrones. 

El quiere continuar con su negocio por eso quiere con préstamo comprar frutas para su puesto. En el futuro quiere tener una familia más numerosa y ubicar un local para su negocio para que sea más segura sus ventas.
texts.en:
Humberto is 35 years old.  He is a hard-working man who started out, 15 years ago, as an itinerant coconut vendor in the streets of his suburb.

Humberto lives with his wife and his 7 year-old son in an urban area.  He works in a regular business which he decided to set up in the local market where lots of people pass through looking to buy food.  He sells natural juices (watermelon, orange, lemon, etc.).

Humberto starts his day setting up a tent in the market from 7.00am until he finishes his work day at 2.00pm.  His wife also helps him in the mornings, making 'tostadas' to sell in his business.

One of the complications that Humberto has in selling his juices is that his market stall is outside and open to thieves.  He would like to continue with his business and, for this reason, he would like to use this loan to buy fruit for his stall.  In the future, he would like to have a larger family and set up premises for his business so that it can be safer.

loans.use: To buy fruit

loans.name: Luna Nueva En Huiloapan Group

texts.es: Esta foto fue tomada en casa D. Concepción F. D., una integrante del grupo D. Luna Nueva en Huiloapan, que está ubicado en el Estado D. Veracruz en México, se logró reunir a 15 integrantes D. las 16 que son, lo cual no siempre se logra al ser grupos tan númerosos. Se ve el comal D. la señora Concepción en la foto. Ella se dedica a la venta D. antojitos en la mañana y en la tarD., negocio que inició hace 15 años. Solicita el préstamo para invertir más en materias primas para la venta D. antojitos. Al momento D. solicitar este préstamo se siente muy contenta. Tiene 50 años estudió hasta la secundaria, es madre y tiene un total D. 3 hijas. Quiere este crédito para invertir en las materias primas para la venta D. antojitos. También espera seguir contando con el apoyo D. la empresa para seguir con el préstamo y así mejorar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
This photo was taken in Concepción F. Domínguez’s house.  She’s a member of the Luna Nueva (New Moon) group in Huiloapan which is in the state of Veracruz in México.  Of the 16 group members, 15 were able to gather together which isn’t always the case in such large groups.

One can see Concepción’s griddle in the photo.  She sells fast food snacks in the morning and afternoon, a business she started 15 years ago.

She is asking for the loan to invest in ingredients for her snack preparation.

At the moment of requesting the loan she feels very happy.  She is 50 years old and studied up to secondary school.  She is a mother of three daughters.

She wants the loan to invest in ingredients to make her fast food snacks.  She also hopes to continue to have the firm’s support to continue with the loan thus improving her profits.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for her food preparation.

loans.name: Maria Lourdes

texts.es:
La señora María de Lurdes A. A. vive en la Ribera Morelia Municipio de Coapilla, Estado de Chiapas México, está casada con el señor Jais Vaquerizo Patricio en el cual procrearon cinco hijos cuatro mujeres y un varón. Dos de ellas  ya están casadas y tres aún están a su responsabilidad: Baltzaretti de 15 años, Marco Antonio en sexto de primaria y la más pequeña Estrella Yuriana de cuatro años.
Ella se dedica a su hogar y a la venta de dulces típicos de la región  como son: dulce de nuégados, coco y dulce de leche, también elabora tamales  que se venden en la región, ella solicitó el préstamo para la compra de ingredientes para poder realizar su actividad.
        La que lo motivo a realizar esta actividad fueron sus dos hijas mayores  quienes  le platicaron que es un buen negocio en donde se obtiene buenos resultados, así comenzó con esta actividad en donde le va muy bien ya que no hay necesidad de salir a venderlo fuera de su ribera pues hay personas que lo compra por encargo y  lo que queda lo sale a vender en las casas cercanas de su domicilio. A un a si su esposo la apoya con los ingresos de su hogar trabajando fuera de su pueblo para que juntos salgan adelante con su familia.
        Con las ganancias que obtiene de su venta de dulces y tamales compra más ingredientes para seguir elaborando su actividad, también ahorrar para comprar algunas cosas necesarias que le hacen falta en su hogar.
        "Gracias a KIVA y a FRAC por apoyar a personas como yo en sus negocios"
texts.en:
Mrs María de Lurdes A. A. lives in Ribera Morelia, in the town of Coapilla, in the State of Chiapas, Mexico.  She is married to Mr Jais Vaquerizo Patricio and they have five children: four daughters and one son.  Two of their children are already married and three are still in their care: 15 year-old Baltzaretti, Marco Antonio who is in his sixth year of elementary school and the youngest, Estrella Yuriana, who is 4.

María looks after her home and also sells traditional sweet treats from her region such as 'dulce de nuégados', 'dulce de coco' and 'dulce de leche'.  She also makes tamales that are sold in the region.

María requested her loan to buy ingredients so that she could carry out her business.  Her two daughters motivated her to set herself up in this business because they argued that it is a good business that obtains good results.  She therefore started this business which is doing very well.  She doesn't have to go far to sell her products as there are people who make orders with her and what she has left she goes out to sell in surrounding houses.  Even so, her husband helps her with their household income, working outside their town, so that together they can get their family ahead in life.

María uses the profits that she makes from selling her sweet treats and tamales to buy more ingredients so that she can continue in her business.  She also saves so that she can buy some things that she needs for her home.  "Thank you to Kiva and FRAC for supporting people such as myself in their businesses".

loans.use: To buy ingredients to make traditional sweet treats from her region and also tamales

loans.name: Alexander

texts.en:
Alexander is married with one daughter. He and his family live in Melitopol. Alexander runs a small business selling warm, colorful blankets, pillows and bed sheets.  He has been in this trade for 7 years and his business has proven to be competitive in this commercial sector. 

Alexander has an enterprising spirit. The success he has achieved is a direct result of his hard work and commitment to his business. Alexander would like to receive a loan of 15,000 Grivnas to increase his assortment of merchandise so that he can provide more items and better service to his customers.

loans.use: To increase assortment of goods

loans.name: Diego Mauricio

texts.es:
Diego de 31 años, es un hombre trabajador que siempre le ha gustado con esfuerzo conseguir sus propios ingresos. El trabajaba como albañil pero con sus ahorros decidió comprar víveres para poder una pequeña tienda en la parte delantera de su casa. 

Viviendo en una zona urbana llamada Guasmo ha comprado bebidas, granos, aceites entre otros estos tres años para vender a los clientes. Trabaja desde las 07h00am atendiendo a sus clientes hasta las 21h00pm todos los días. Trabaja con ayuda de su hermano vendiendo en la tienda arroz, enlatados, bebidas etc.    

Con el préstamo quiere comprar víveres para su tienda como arroz, azúcar, bebidas, enlatados. En el futuro quiere ampliar el negocio y así satisfacer las necesidades del cliente.
texts.en:
Diego, 31, is a hard working man who has always liked to earn his own income through his own efforts.  He used to work as a bricklayer but used his savings to buy groceries and set up a small grocery store in the front part of his house.

Living in an urban zone, called Guasmo, he has bought soft drinks, grains and cooking oils, among others, these past three years to sell to customers.  He works from 7am until 9pm every day.  His brother helps him to sell rice, canned goods, beverages, etc.

He wants to use the loan to buy foodstuffs for his store like: rice, sugar, beverages and canned goods.  In the future he’s like to expand the business thus meeting customer needs.

loans.use: For rice and sugar.

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es:
La señora María Mercedes Pérez López, vive en la Ribera  Morelia Municipio de Coapilla Estado de Chiapas  México, vive en unión libre con el señor Galileo Vaquerizo Pérez, ellos tienen cuatro hijos de quien una de ellos ya está casada y tres quedan a su responsabilidad y son: María Luvia  de 14 años, el otro es Francisco Damián de 6 años y el más pequeño es Galileo Daniel.
        Ella se dedica a elaborar antojitos como son: donas, chicharrones, choco-bananas, roscas, entre otros y solicitó el préstamo  para la compra de ingredientes para que con ello pueda trabajar más días a la semana  y así tenga mejor ingreso en su hogar, con esta actividad lleva seis años  y comenta que le va bien  pues ha tenido  ingresos.
        Se inspiró en esta actividad ya que  también quiere  apoyar a su esposo aportando con los ingresos  de su hogar, así  tener lo más necesario en su familia y salir adelante trabajando juntos con su esposo.
        Con las ganancia que va obteniendo de su venta lo guarda para comprar más ingredientes  que le hace falta para su actividad, como también  tener para ser puntual en su pagos y así no tener ningún problema con la FRAC pues necesita el apoyo para poder trabajar.
       Su sueño es que logre ahorrar  para apoyar a sus hijos  que vienen creciendo darles estudio para que terminen una carrera  y de  ello dependan cuando ya estén grandes.
texts.en:
Mrs. María Mercedes Pérez López lives in Ribera Morelia, Coapilla, in the state of Chiapas, México in a common law relationship with Mr. Galileo Vaquerizo Pérez.  They have four children.  One of them is married and three are still dependent on them:  María Luvia, 14, Francisco Damián, 6 and the youngest, Galileo Daniel.

She makes fast food snacks like: donuts, chicharrones, chocolate covered bananas, ring cookies, etc. and asked for a loan to buy ingredients so that she can work more days during the week and have better income for her home.  She has been in this business for 6 years and she comments that she does well because she’s had income.

She was inspired in this activity because she wants to support her husband contributing to household income and have what is most necessary for her family and together with her husband get ahead.

She saves the profits from her sales to buy more ingredients she needs for her activity but also to have enough to be punctual with her repayments so that she will not have any problems with FRAC because she needs its support to be able to work.

Her dream is to manage to support her children who are growing up and provide them with schooling so that they will finish careers they can depend on when they are grown.

loans.use: To buy ingredients to make donuts, cakes, chicharrines (crispy fried dough snacks), among others.

loans.name: Crucero De San Vicente 1 Group

texts.es: Esta foto fue tomada en el negocio de la señora Eleuteria Hernández quien es tesorera del grupo CRUCERO DE SAN VICENTE 1 que está ubicado en la localidad de San Vicente en Jilotepec Edo.de México, en la foto se puede apreciar a las señoras que forman parte de este grupo, ella se dedica a la VENTA DE TORTILLAS DE COMAL el cual inició hace 10 años, solicita el prestamo para comprar otro comal y más maiz ya que el comal  que tiene ya no sirve muy bien.Las clientas de la señora comentan que sus tortillas son muy ricas y ademas son de las mejor calidad que venden en la localidad .Ella tiene 43 años sólo estudió la primaria y es casada y apesar de no contar con un buen grado de estudios es muy aguerrida en su trabajo, tiene una hija de 20 años a la señora la motiva seguir trabajando con dedicación ya que con las ganacias de su trabajo quiere hacer un buen patrimonio para cuando ella ya no pueda trabajar y no ser una carga para su familia.
texts.en:
This photo was taken in Mrs. Eleuteria Hernández’s business.  She is the Treasurer of the CRUCERO DE SAN VICENTE I group which is located in San Vicente in Jilotepec, México state.  In the photo we can see the women who form this group.

She has sold comal (flat, earthenware griddle for making tortillas) tortillas for 10 years.  She is asking for funds to buy another comal and more corn because the comal she owns doesn’t work too well anymore.  Her customers comment that her tortillas are very good and the best quality sold in their location.

She is 43 years old and only went to elementary school.  She’s married and, even though she didn’t get a lot of schooling, she is very experienced in her work.  She has a 20 year old daughter.  She is motivated to continue working with dedication because she wants to use profits from her work to establish a good patrimony so that when she’s no longer able to work she won’t be a burden to her family.

loans.use: To buy another griddle and more corn.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La señora Juana Sánchez S., vive en la localidad de Morelia, Municipio de Coapilla, Estado de Chiapas México. Vive en unión libre con el señor Pedro Pérez Sánchez y tienen cuatro hijos a su responsabilidad: Julieta de 11 años, que estudia el quinto año de primaria, el otro es Neftalí de 9 años, María del Carmen de 4 años y el ultimo es Aron de 2 años.
           Ella solicita el préstamo para su depósito de refresco, pero principalmente para surtir su negocio de abarrotes  ya que le hacen falta muchas cosas para verse mejor y su clientela adquiera lo que desea comprar.
           Comenta que desde muy joven ella comenzó a vender con su mamá y cuando se caso se dispuso a poner un negocio en donde le diera ingresos en su hogar y así apoyar as u esposo y salir adelante con sus hijos que están creciendo.
           Con las ganancias que va obteniendo lo invierte comparado mercancía par su tienda, como también pagar su compromiso en fundación realidad en ser puntual con sus pagos y le sigan otorgando el préstamo ya que  con ello se apoya mucho comprando lo que le hace falta en su negocio.
          Su sueño que logre agrandar su negocio para que con ello trabaje y así apoye a sus hijos a que estudien y sean personas con una profesión del cual puedan depender de ellos mismos.
texts.en:
Mrs. Juana Sánchez S. lives in the Morelia neighborhood in the city of Coapilla, which is in the state of Chiapas, Mexico. She lives in a common-law marriage with Mr. Pedro Pérez Sánchez, and they have four children in their care. Julieta, age 11, is in the 5th grade. The others are Neftalí, age 9, María, age 4, and Aron, age 2.
She asks for this loan for her soda deposit, but mainly to supply her business with groceries, since many things are missing. She wants her store to look better and her clientele to purchase what they want to buy.
She mentions that when she was very young, she began to sell with her mom. And when she got married, she set out to put a business in the entrance to her home. In this way she can support her husband and continue improving life for her children that are growing.
With the income that she is going to obtain, she will purchase merchandise for her store. Also, she will pay her promised amount to Fundación Realidad. She will pay her payments on time so they continue to grant her the loan, since it supports her to buy what she lacks in her business.
Her dream is to make her business larger so that she can work with it. This will help her to support her children in their studies, and so that they will be people with a profession so they can depend on themselves.

loans.use: To buy sugar, beans, oil, oatmeal, coffee, and other things.

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es:
El señor es soltero, vive en el barrio obrero de la ciudad de Pilar.
Vive en casa propia, donde se refleja que poseen con todas las comodidades para un trabajador.
El mismo es comerciante, cuenta con una  empresa comercial donde distribuye, mercaderías por la zona de Pilar e interior del departamento.
Solicita el crédito para compras de mercaderías para su negocio.
Cuenta con una antigüedad en el ramo más de 5 años, brindando sus buenos servicios a sus clientelas.
Cliente manifiesta que con la ayuda del crédito se ha fortalecido  más su microempresa y  agradece por los buenos servicios que les brinda la Fundación Paraguaya.
texts.en:
He is single and lives in the worker's neighborhood of the city of Pilar in his own house where one can see that he enjoys all the comforts of a worker.

He is a merchant.  He has a commercial firm selling merchandise throughout Pilar and the interior of the department.

He is asking for funds to buy merchandise for his business.

He has been in this line of work for over 5 years providing good customer service.

He states that help from the loan has strengthened his micro business and he appreciates the good services he gets from Fundación Paraguaya.

loans.use: To buy merchandise like: canned goods, flour, noodles, sugar and others.

loans.name: Sameera

texts.en:
Sameera is a pharmacist from Gaza city in Gaza Strip. Sameera's husband is a pharmacist too. They started their own pharmacy five years ago and have been running it together. Sameera and Sameer have two daughters: Rahaf who is 4 years old and Raghad, 2 years old.

Sameera came to FATEN and took out a loan to purchase a large amount of medications as well as hygienic items which will increase the returns and attract more customers. Sameera is a religious woman, as are most of Gaza's inhabitants; therefore, Sameer appears in the picture here.

loans.use: To purchase medications and hygienic products

loans.name: Genessis Marilin

texts.es:
Gennessis es una joven emprendedora que siempre le ha gustado tener una economía estable por eso es  vendedora de productos Yambal (empresa que ofrece a mujeres emprendedoras comenzar con sus ventas independientes),  

Viviendo en una zona urbana llamada Guasmo realiza su trabajo sola  desde las 08h00am hasta las 17h00pm, desde muy temprano ofreciendo los productos a sus vecinos y amigos, vende perfumes desde $ 20.00 hasta $ 50.00 c/u, cremas a $ 15.00, desodorantes a $ 10.00. Una de las preocupaciones que tiene al salir a vender los productos es la delincuencia que se ha incrementado en el sector donde vive. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar productos Yambal como perfumes, cremas, desodorantes. Quiere continuar con las ventas Yanbal por eso quiere en el futuro seguir vendiendo cosméticos y diversifícalo con ropa.
texts.en:
Gennessis is a young entrepreneur who has always enjoyed having a stable economy.  She sells Yanbal brand products (a firm that offers enterprising women the opportunity to go into independent sales).

Living in an urban zone, called Guasmo, she works alone from 8am until 5pm offering products from very early on to her neighbors and friends.  She sells perfumes from $20.00 up to $50.00 each, creams for $15.00, deodorants for $10.00.  One of her worries when she has to go out to sell is the delinquency rate which has increased in the sector where she lives.

She will use the loan to buy Yanbal brand products like: perfumes, creams and deodorants.  She wants to continue with Yanbal sales so wants to continue selling cosmetics in the future and diversity with clothing.

loans.use: For perfumes and cosmetics.

loans.name: Del Rosario

texts.es:
El Sr. Del Rosario  de 47 años de edad es comerciante y está acompañado con la Sra. Delia de 52 años de edad. Juntos tienen un hijo de 12 años llamado Briam José, quien está culminando  su  séptimo grado de la Educación  Escolar Básica.
Del Rosario  empezó trabajando en la confección en San Paulo Brasil, hace más de 20 años, y que con mucho sacrificio consiguió  el capital para la compra de máquinas. Actualmente posee 5 máquinas con que trabaja día a día  para sacar adelante a toda su familia.  
Ha decidido confiar en la Fundación Paraguaya  solicitando el préstamo para la compra de telas, ya que actualmente con la llegada de fin de año cuenta con un gran número de pedidos.
texts.en:
Mr. Del Rosario is a 47 year-old merchant.  He is in a relationship with Ms. Delia, who is 52 years old.  They have a 12 year old son together named Briam José, who is finishing the seventh grade of primary school.

Del Rosario started making clothing more than 20 years ago in San Paulo, Brazil.  With a great deal of sacrifice, he was able to obtain the capital to buy sewing machines.  Now he owns five sewing machines, which he works with day in and day out in order to help his family get ahead.

He decided to trust in Fundación Paraguaya and request a loan in order to buy fabric, since with the arrival of the end of the year, he has many orders to fill.

loans.use: to buy fabric

loans.name: Las Nazarenas Group

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Las Nazarenas inicia su segundo ciclo con 16 socios-as, los cuales tienen variados  negocios. Rufina E. es socia D. Banco Comunal, es casada, tiene 6 hijos y 4 nietos. El mayor D. sus hijos es casado, otros dos D. sus hijos se han graduado D. L. Universidad, y 2 aun se encuentran estudiando.
Rufina compra verduras para vender en su puesto en uno D. los mercados principales D. Ayacucho, el préstamo que solicita lo utilizara en L. compra D. verduras en cantidad al por mayor. A Rufina le gusta las reuniones D. su Banco Comunal, aunque admite que con su trabajo ocupado y L. vida familiar, a veces le es difícil llegar a las reuniones programadas cada dos semanas. 
El sueño D. Rufina es que todos sus hijos se gradúen D. L. universidad y sean profesionales.
texts.en:
The Las Nazarenas Communal Bank, which is starting its second loan cycle, has 16 members who run a variety of businesses.

Rufina E. is a member of the communal bank who is married and has six children and four grandchildren.  Her oldest child is married, two others have graduated from university, and two are still in school.  Rufina buys vegetables to sell at her stand in one of the main markets of Ayacucho.  She will use the loan she is requesting to buy vegetables in wholesale quantities.  Rufina enjoys her communal bank's meetings, though she admits that with her busy work and family life, it is sometimes difficult to attend the meetings that are scheduled every two weeks.

Rufina's dream is for all of her children to graduate from university and to become professionals.

loans.use: to buy vegetables in wholesale quantities

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a makeup kit and hair products

loans.name: Yana

texts.en:
Yana is married, with two children. She sells clothing at the main open market in Novomoskovsk town. Yana has been in this business for 9 years. Her hard-working habits and enthusiasm encourage other market venders to continue their businesses in spite of difficult economic times.

Yana has used micro loans before and found them very helpful for her business development. She would like to borrow 15,000 Grivnas to purchase more winter inventory. Yana's business goal is to start a second location to increase sales.

loans.use: To purchase more inventory

loans.name: Vilma Del Socorro

texts.es: Vilma del Socorro tiene mucho tiempo de trabajar con Fundación León 2000 pues siempre por lo que no es la primera vez que solicita créditos.  Ella  se dedica a la elaboración de ropa variada, bolsos y mochilas. Su forma de comercializar sus productos es de manera ambulante ya que es la única manera de obtener una gran variedad de clientes. Actualmente solicita este crédito para la compra de materia prima como hilos, tijeras, tela, zipper entre otras cosas. Pues en esta temporada tiene bastantes encargos y quiere mantener  su clientela.
texts.en: Vilma del Socorro has been working with Fundación León 2000 for quite some time, so this is not the first time she is requesting a loan.  She makes a variety of clothing, bags, and backpacks.  She sells her products on foot, as this is the only way to obtain a good variety of customers.  Right now she is requesting a loan to buy thread, scissors, fabric, zippers, and other materials, because she receives a lot of orders at this time of year and wants to maintain her clientele.

loans.use: to buy thread, scissors, fabric, zippers, and other sewing materials

loans.name: Alma Iris

texts.es: Alma Iris es una joven que tiene mucho tiempo de trabajar con Fundación  su negocio es el servicio de taller de carpintería y una pulpería. Ella busco la forma de mejorar su medio de vida siempre la experiencia que ha obtenido con ambos negocios ha sido muy difícil pero con una buena administración han salido adelante. El motivo del financiamiento que solicitan es para la compra de materia prima para arroz, aceite, golosinas, frijoles y madera para la carpintería.
texts.en: Alma Iris is a young woman who has been working with Fundación Leon 2000 for quite some time. Her businesses are a carpentry workshop and a pulpería [small grocery store]. She is always looking for ways to improve her quality of life. The experience she has gained through both businesses has been difficult, but thanks to her good management, they have continued to succeed. The reason she is requesting this loan is to buy staple products like rice, oil, candies, and beans, as well as wood for her carpentry business.

loans.use: to buy staple products for her small grocery store and wood for her carpentry business

loans.name: Santa Lucia Group

texts.es:
Comité Santa Lucia, así se denomina el grupo de mujeres conformado en de Capiata en fecha 11 de Agosto de 2010,gracias a que la actual Directora de Finanzas, quien se dedica a la elaboración y  venta de comidas ,contactó con la asesora en una reunión semanal que la misma tenía en la zona, para enterarse de la forma de trabajo que tiene el Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras, una vez asesorada acerca del Programa logró juntar a 16 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto ya en el 2° ciclo, en forma conjunta y solidaria dentro del programa.
Antonia es una de las integrantes, una mujer muy creativa quien se dedica a la fabricación de bijouterie, comenta que le gusta mucho su trabajo por disfruta haciéndolo y crea modelos de aros, gargantillas, y pulseras muy atractivas para sus clientas.
Ella solicita el préstamo para la compra de accesorios que utiliza para la fabricación de bijouterie.
texts.en:
This group of women is called the "Santa Lucia" Committee. The group was formed in Capiata on August 11, 2010, thanks to the financial director, who prepares and sells foods. She contacted the advisor in a weekly meeting that she was having in the zone, to train in the type of work that the "Enterprising Women" Committee has. Once advised about the program, she began to get 16 women together who were already working really hard on the 2nd cycle, together and on their own with the program.
Antonia is one of the members. She is a very creative woman who makes costume jewelry. She mentions that she like her job a lot. She enjoys making it and creating very attractive models of hoops, necklaces, and bracelets for her customers.
She asks for the loan to buy accessories that she will use to make costume jewelry.

loans.use: To buy accessories to make jewelry.

loans.name: Maria De Jesus

texts.es: Maria tiene 50 años donde vive con su dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de comida, este negocio lo tiene desde hace 10 años, trabaja todos el día desde las 5 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche, aprendió a este negocio por su mama que le enseño este medio de vida. Esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercadería granos básicos, verduras, platos, bolsas y cubiertos además de comprar mesas y sillas para ampliar la atención adecuada a los clientes.La aspiración principal es generar ganancias para cubrir los gastos del hogar y pagar este préstamo.
texts.en: Maria is 50 years old; she lives with her two children. She sells meals; she has had this business for 10 years, working every day from 5 am to 10 pm. She learned this business from her mother, who taught her this way of life. She is requesting a loan to purchase supplies such as basic grains, vegetables, plates, bags, and cutlery, as well as buy tables and chairs to draw appropriate attention from her customers. Her main goal is to generate revenue to cover household expenses and repay this loan.

loans.use: Working capital

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for advertising and promotional materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Magda

texts.es: Magda, de 45 años es una valerosa madre soltera de 7 hijos, pero solo viven con 3 de ellos: Grecia, de 19, Yomira, de 15 y José, de 13 años de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en Playa Hermosa – San Ramón (selva central peruana). En Playa hermosa, lugar donde vive Magda, se encuentra una de las cataratas más importantes de Perú “Tirol”; ahí ella vende comida típica del lugar; ya tiene 6 años dedicándose a esto y según mencionan todos los días desde las primeras horas de la mañana hasta muy noche endulza el paladar, de los que visitan constantemente el lugar turístico. Ella pertenece al grupo comunal “las heliconias”, donde trabaja para triunfar en su negocio y seguir adelante, por ello está pensando implementar con nuevos productos, bebidas, dulces y demás productos comestibles, que escasean en el lugar. Es el décimo crédito con MFP, y como fundadora de su banco comunal, se siente reconfortada por todo el trabajo realizado. Con el crédito solicitado, ha pensado implementar su negocio, con la compra de gaseosas y bebidas para su puesto de comida.
texts.en: Magda, 45 years old, is a courageous single mother of seven, but only three of the kids live with her. They are Grecia, 19, Yomira, 15, and Jose, 13 years old. The family lives in their own home, which is located in Playa Hermosa - San Ramon (central Peruvian rainforest). In Playa Hermosa, where Magda lives, there is one of Peru's most important waterfalls, "Tirol." There, she sells local cuisine; she already has six years' experience in this work. Every day, from the early hours of the morning until late at night, she brightens up the palates of the people who are constantly visiting this tourist spot. She belongs to the communal bank of Las Heliconias, where she works to improve her business and move forward. Because of this, she is thinking of introducing new products, beverages, desserts, and other foods that are in short supply in the area. This is her 10th loan with Kiva parter MFP, and as the founder of her communal bank, she is comforted by all the work they have done. With the loan that she is requesting, she is planning to expand her business by buying sodas and other beverages for her food stand.

loans.use: Purchase sodas and other beverages

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La Sra. Francisca F. de Maldonado de 69 años de edad, es una persona muy responsable y sacrificada que se dedica a la actividad de venta de mercaderías para la despensa tales como arroz, azúcar, fideos, leche, carbón entre otros hace más de 20 años. 
La misma nos comenta que se encuentra muy satisfecha por los resultados del préstamo  otorgado por la Institución, y que día a día se siente más comprometida con la Fundación Paraguaya, por el apoyo que le brindan, y nos comentó que seguirá trabajando con responsabilidad  y la vez abonando al día para poder obtener otros créditos y así devolver la confianza que se le volvió a dar hacia su persona.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de verduras, lácteos, enlatados, embutidos, azúcar, y otros.
texts.en:
Francisca F. de Maldonado, 69 years old, is a very responsible and sacrificing woman who has been selling groceries such as rice, sugar, pasta, milk, charcoal, etc., for more than 20 years.

She tells us that she is very satisfied with the loan authorized by our organization, and that day by day she feels more committed to Kiva partner Fundacion Paraguaya because of the support they've given her. She also told us that she continues to work responsibly and make her payments so she can get other loans and so live up to the trust that was given her.

She is requesting this loan to purchase vegetables, dairy products, canned goods, lunch meats, sugar, etc.

loans.use: Purchase vegetables, dairy products, canned goods, lunch meats, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a father of two sons and one daughter. He lives in Bethlehem and has been a taxi driver for 20 years. Ibrahim transports passengers between the three neighboring cities of Bethlehem, Bet Sahour and Bet Jala.

Ibrahim came to FATEN to take a loan that would cover regular car maintenance and car insurance fees. Ibrahim, his wife and children live with the parents. The taxi is the main source of income for the whole family.

Ibrahim appears in the picture in his taxi.

loans.use: To pay for car maintenance and car insurance fees

loans.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es: Solicitante, tiene 43 años, es saoltera vive en casa familiar, se dedica al negocio hace mas de 2 años,  señora tiene la meta de tener negocio propio, y cumplir con sus sueños y objetivos, solicita credito para capital de trabajo, para invertir en el negocio,
texts.en: The person requesting the loan is 43 years old. She is single and lives in her family's home. She has been working in this line of business for more than two years. Her ambition is to have her own business and to reach her goals and dreams, so she is requesting this loan for working capital so she can invest in her business.

loans.use: Invest in her business

loans.name: Nicasio Arcenio

texts.es: Nicasio Arecenio es una persona trabajadora que le gusta este medio de vida. El se dedica a brindar el servicio de carpintería, hace mas de 6 años que tiene este negocio lo inicio con unas ganancias que había obtenido de acerrar madera pues anteriormente trabajaba en ese negocio con el paso del tiempo es que decide establecer su propio negocio y empezar este medio de vida. el crédito de que solicita es para la compra de materia prima como madera, herramientas entre otras cosas actualmente quiere aprovechar la temporada festiva ya que tiene algunos encargos.
texts.en: Nicasio Arecenio is a hardworking person who likes his lifestyle. He provides carpentry services. He has had this business for more than six years; he started it with some income that he got through woodwork. Before, he was working in this line of business, and over time he decided to start his own business and begin this way of life. The loan he is requesting is to purchase basic materials such as wood, tools, and other things. He wants to take advantage of the holiday season and he already has some orders.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE I”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Ruben; el tiene 30 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa al por mayor, el socio también estudia la carrera profesional de derecho y con respecto al negocio el socio distribuye a las diferentes tiendas que vende ropas, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de ropa.El socio solicita el prestamo para comprar ropa al por mayor.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower is a member of the Comuzone I Communal Bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, part of the province and department of Cusco.

The borrower is Ruben. He is 30 years old and single. He alternates between his daily activities for his wholesale clothing business; he is also studying law. With respect to the business, he distributes to different clothing stores. He wants to grow and improve his clothing sales business. He is requesting this loan to purchase clothing wholesale.

He is happy about this loan and promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: Purchase clothing wholesale

loans.name: Rosmeri

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE I”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosmeri; ella tiene 23 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa deportiva, la socia atiende desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia quiere mejorar y ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower is a member of the Comuzone I Communal Bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco. It is part of the province and department of Cusco.

The borrower is Rosmeri; she is 23 years old, single, with one son. She rotates through her daily activities for the athletic clothing sales business. She tends the business from 9 am to 6 pm. She wants to improve and grow her clothing sales business. She is requesting the loan to purchase clothes wholesale.

The borrower is happy with this loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: Purchase clothes wholesale

loans.name: Maria Carmela

texts.es:
María es socia del Banco Comunal Llamkasum, es casada, tiene 79 años y 6 hijos. Maria ha estado con FINCA por más D. 15 años, le encanta que su Banco Comunal le apoye cuando tiene necesidades financieras. Estuvo mal D. salud, aun está mejorando, todavía viaja mensualmente a Lima para recibir tratamiento. María no habría sido capaz D. pagar este tratamiento si no fuera por sus ahorros que tiene en FINCA Perú. 
María solicita un préstamo para abastecer D. productos su negocio y comprar productos como el azúcar, la harina y el arroz, los cuales venD. en una tienda que tiene en su casa. También se dedica a la crianza D. animales como vacas, pollos en su casa ubicada a una hora y media en las afueras D. Ayacucho. 
El sueño D. Maria es seguir ahorrando para tener dinero cuando realmente lo necesita como lo hizo cuando estaba enferma.
texts.en:
María is an associate of the Llamkasum Communal Bank.  She is married, 79 years of age and has 6 children. Maria has been with FINCA for more than 15 years.  She is pleased with her Communal Bank because they support her when she has financial needs. She has had poor health, but is improving.  She still travels to Lima monthly to receive treatments.  María would not have been able to pay for the treatments if it weren't for the savings that she has with FINCA Perú. 
María has requested a loan to supply her business with products and to buy products such as sugar, flour and rice, which she sells in a store that she has in her house.  She is also dedicated to raising animals such as cows and chickens at her home located an hour and a half from the outskirts of  Ayacucho. 
Maria's dream is to continue saving in order to have money when she really needs it, as she did when she was ill.

loans.use: To buy supplies for her general store

loans.name: Hugo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE I”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Hugo; el tiene 33 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el estudio de la carrera profesional de geología y también está haciendo sus prácticas en la región de la ciudad de Cusco, el socio quiere seguir mejorando en sus estudios. El  socio solicita el préstamo para graduarse y poder salir profesional.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "COMUZONE I". The bank is located in the district, province, and state department of Cusco.
Hugo is 33 years old, lives with his partner, and has a son. He alternates his daily activities between studying his professional career in geology and also doing his practicum in the region of the city of Cusco. He wants to continue improving his studies. He asks for the loan to graduate and to become a professional.
He his happy because of the loan and promises to follow through with the payment of his dues.

loans.use: To graduate and become a professional.

loans.name: Eduvigis

texts.es: Eduvigis, de 40 años convive con Fredy, de 45 años. Ambos tienen una hija,”Fiorela”, de 6 años de edad. En unión familiar los tres viven en su casa propia, ubicada en Playa Hermosa – San Ramón (selva central peruana).
